name: CoffeeMaker
description:
Linus needs to work but he is way to tired for this... He needs a coffe.

But, his kitchen is the messiest the world has ever seen.

In this short and challenging gameboy styled side-scrolling platformer you have to collect coffee beans and get a coffee before you will fell to sleep or die.

It was made for the lost cartridge game jam 2021.

Its only a beta version, I will make updates soon.
